item.description:
Darik & the Funbags are coming back to Toad's Place on Friday December 28th. They are a cover band that plays a mix of songs and the shows are usually a lot of fun. Don't come if you mind a little bit of swearing from the band...ok, motherf**kers?

The show starts at 9 pm, but there are 4 opening bands so Darik and the Funbags will probably start playing around midnight. Tickets are $8.50 in advance, $10 at the door but you can usually find coupons around New Haven for free admittance before 10/$5 after 10.

For more info:

Toad's Place website

Darik and the Funbags website (also has the free before 10/$5 after 10 tickets):

Darik and the Funbags website
item.how_to_find_us: Andrea is the contact (Cell # 203-641-8083). I will probably get to Toad's around 10 pm that night although once I get into Toad's it might be tough for me to hear my cell phone.
item.name: DARIK & THE FUNBAGS at Toad's Place 12/28
